title: Fight Acne the Ayurvedic Way: Neem Face Mist Rituals
author: Harish
excerpt: Neem face mists offer a simple yet effective Ayurvedic approach to calming breakouts and refreshing overheated skin.
content:
Why Neem Is Ayurveda’s Go-To for Acne

Neem has been used for centuries to calm inflammatory skin conditions. Its antimicrobial and cooling energies make it ideal for Pitta-type breakouts characterized by redness, heat, and irritation.

How a Neem Face Mist Works

This mist combines three powerful Ayurvedic allies:

  • Neem infusion to reduce microbial buildup.
  • Aloe vera to soothe inflammation.
  • Rose hydrosol to cool and hydrate lightly.

How to Use This Mist in Your Routine

  1. Cleanse with a gentle, sulfate-free cleanser.
  2. Spray neem mist generously across the face.
  3. Follow with a lightweight gel moisturizer.
  4. Reapply mid-day to control oil and refresh skin.

Pairing Rituals for Better Results

  • Weekly clay mask for deeper purification.
  • Reduce spicy, oily foods that aggravate Pitta.
  • Stay hydrated with cooling herbs like coriander water.

Safety Tips

Patch-test before first use, especially if sensitive. For moderate to severe acne, consult a dermatologist.

Shop Neem Face Mist and cool your skin the Ayurvedic way.
